fields.name: Instruction Modes
fields.value:
`ib VDBPSADBW xmm1 {k1}{z}, xmm2, xmm3/m128, imm8`
`ib VDBPSADBW ymm1 {k1}{z}, ymm2, ymm3/m256, imm8`
`ib VDBPSADBW zmm1 {k1}{z}, zmm2, zmm3/m512, imm8`

fields.name: Description
fields.value: Compute packed SAD (sum of absolute differences) word results of unsigned bytes from two 32-bit dword elements. Packed SAD word results are calculated in multiples of qword superblocks, producing 4 SAD word results in each 64-bit superblock of the destination register.
